mapper.insert: insert into board (board_num,board_name,board_pass,board_subject,board_content,board_file, board_re_ref, board_re_lev, board_re_seq, board_readcount, board_date) values(#{board_num},#{board_name},#{board_pass},#{board_subject},#{board_content},#{board_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_re_ref},#{board_re_lev},#{board_re_seq},#{board_readcount},sysdate)
mapper.select: select board_num,board_name,board_pass,board_subject,board_content,board_file,board_re_ref, board_re_lev,board_re_seq,board_readcount,board_date from (select row_number() over (order by board_re_ref desc, board_re_seq asc) num, B.* from board B order by board_re_ref desc, board_re_seq asc) where num between #{row} and #{row}+9
mapper.update: update board set board_subject=#{board_subject}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_num=#{board_num}
update board set board_re_seq=board_re_seq+1 where board_re_ref=#{board_re_ref} and board_re_seq>#{board_re_seq}
